concept.title: 5349.7003 Notification of Anticipated Terminations or Reductions

li.p: (b)(2)(i) The contracting officer must submit the draft notification through the SCO to SAF/AQC as soon as the proposed termination/reduction is known. SAF/AQC will forward the notification to SAF/AQ for signature (see MP5349 ).
